website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for easy assembly, lightweight build, and ability to get up larger items without jamming, try this model.
pros: The convenience of a bottom zipper on the collection bag
Collection bag has a shoulder strap
Handles sticks and gumballs without clogging
Strong, but not so powerful that it will pick up landscaping rocks, only leaves, pine needles, and other small debris
cons: The blade on this unit is plastic rather than metal

customer_reviews.title: A good tool for the price
customer_reviews.text: I use this mostly as a leaf vacuum. There are two speeds, but low doesn't have much suction. Works well on high speed, and chops the leaves up nicely to save on lawn bags. The blade is plastic, but it handles small twigs and sweet gum tree balls well. I wish the tube were about 2" longer, though. I have to bend over to use it and it's hard on the back.
customer_reviews.author: JLSTL

customer_reviews.title: If you want to get rid of those pesky leaves of the fall quickly look no further.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent vacuum cleaned the front of my house easily. Very powerful and have only used the vacuum feature not the blower. It’s good also because of it’s bag and you can easily empty the bag and continue getting rid of the leaves. No longer have to sweep up lots of leaves in the front or backyard.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Vega

customer_reviews.title: Strong Vaccume
customer_reviews.text: Simply LOVED IT. I have used it to clean my yard yesterday, it didnt take me long and the vaccume works perfect. Price was great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Pranav J

customer_reviews.title: Great blower & leaf mulcher!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble, as well as attach/unattach end whether you're blowing or using to suck up leaves to mulch. Bag easily unzips when ready to empty. Really like that there are two different speeds for both blowing & sucking leaves, however I use the higher powered speed for both blowing and sucking, so I highly rate this device!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Good blower!
customer_reviews.text: Very good blower for garden clean up. I use it a lot and works great now. Just what I need. Make me get rid of pick up leaves. It’s very powerful and really easy to use. The holding bag is very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Marginal product quality
customer_reviews.text: Mechanicly, it works well. The bag that catches the leaves had a zipper failure after 30 minutes making the vacuum feature unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I NEVER write reviews, but this blower/vacuum is so impressive I had to! We originally purchased this product for the blower, to clean out our dryer vent ducting, but have ended up using the vacuum part even more. I used it to vacuum up the fall leaves from in and around our pond and stream bed. The power is perfect. Not too strong that it picks up the small pebbles, but strong enough to get the dead dry leaves. There are two power options which makes it perfect for whatever job you are doing. The mulcher portion worked great. This product made fall cleanup a breeze. I would buy again in a heart beat!
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: These blowers are pretty awesome for the price. I used to just use broom and it’s a pain. This makes it so much easier. The great thing is that it also works as vacuum. I used it to vacuum leaves in the yard and it works great. Pretty compact size but very powerful with the two levels.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t know what to expect because of the price,” you know you only get what you pay for” but I was pleasantly surprised this is a very well made leaf blower. It mulched the leaves with no problem and was easy to use. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Klein

customer_reviews.title: Not powerful
customer_reviews.text: Not as powerful as I thought. This is my first leaf blower so I’m not sure how the others measure up to this one but it did have good reviews; I’m just not impressed. It took me an hour to do a tiny portion of my yard. As by tiny portion I mean just a strip, I don’t know measurements. I knw my yard isn’t big and I didn’t even clear half before I was over it; and emptied the bag 3 times. And I had to have the hose almost touching the ground for it to pick up the leaves.
customer_reviews.author: Kamilah

customer_reviews.title: My only issue is common to all multching vacuums
customer_reviews.text: Better than my last for blowing but that’s difference between ac and dc. Multcher is a new feature to me I like it but the novelty is wearing away. When multching wet leaves (they are always at least damp in wa) a fine dirt or mud of leaf bits builds up lessening the power. Once cleaned out it’s fine but I find I get about an hour or less between cleaning which leads me to multching is more work than I need to do. Otherwise this is 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: greg b.

customer_reviews.title: Good leaf blower, don’t for get to buy extension cord.
customer_reviews.text: Powerful and versatile. It is a good product all around. The one I had was not very good, so I got this leaf blower and this fall it performed well. We’ll see how well it hold up, I’ll be back to update. As too assembly. It can be a little hard, which is why I included a video to show you exactly how each mode works. It has a blade to chop up the leafs so it takes up less room. It uses regular 15 amp, so a 15 amp extension cord would work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Good vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically for the bag and leaf vacuum. It works well, the mulcher in the unit is beneficial when picking up leaves. The bag seems to fill up quick, but that's not a complaint - just an observation. I didn't realize at first that there were 2 speeds on it, on mine you have to push the switch just a little hard to get it to high. I'd buy it again - overall a good purchase
customer_reviews.author: Darren O

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t panic when you first see this product. Looks flemzy...all plastic but it PERFORMES. Light weight and balances well. I only use it to vacuum leaves so can’t comment on the blower feature. You need to know.....if you have small hands, weak hands or arthritis the collection bag will be a pain in the you-know- what to disconnect!
customer_reviews.author: LARRY

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a refurbished product and it works well. I pick up ONLY dry leaves and clean out the suction after each use. It takes a while to pick up the leaves but the mulch is well worth the effort and I can add more leaves to the trash can; great space saver.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and unbalanced
customer_reviews.text: This leaf vacuum/blower works ok, it’s just too long for me so it feels cumbersome and unbalanced. I’m a woman 5’5” and I struggle to keep it off the ground. The suction and the blowing is fine, the whole thing is just unbalanced
customer_reviews.author: Lynette Hairrell

customer_reviews.title: Works great, although I haven't tried the leaf blower option.
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum worked real good, my reason for the 4 star rating, I think the catch bag could be larger, it filled up quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Mergenthal

customer_reviews.title: Vaccum part Doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: It's an okay lead blower but the vacuum won't mulch much at all. It gets clogged if you do a bunch of leaves that are piled up and it cant handle litle sticks that the weeping willow drops everywhere. It also can't be used on wet leaves.
customer_reviews.author: AliChristi89

customer_reviews.title: Terrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: While the vacuuming is great, the leaf bag is of poor quality.mi have several which I needed to sew and had to replace the zipper. I contact their customer service and was told they would take care of it and wanted to male sure I was happy. I have sent them 2 videos that they requested as well as pictures and I have not heard a word. It is a great tool but the lousy customer service ruins a good item
customer_reviews.author: Scott Smith

customer_reviews.title: This Really Works
customer_reviews.text: My husband actually doesn't dread getting leaves up anymore. It shreds the leaves so fewer bags are needed. And it cuts down raking time by at least half.
customer_reviews.author: betty

customer_reviews.title: Great leaf blower, but yet to use the suction mulch
customer_reviews.text: Very good leaf blower here in my opinion. Did the job, easy to hold and handle. 2 speed for blowing. Have not used the suction into mulch. Don’t really need it for that. But I’m satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mike D.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality of vacuum bag
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum bag ripped after 3-4 times of normal use. And it is impossible to find a replacement. The merchant did not reply for 6 days after receiving my email of photos of damage.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Great product but bad bag.
customer_reviews.text: The blower and vacuum work great but the first bag developed a hole on the first use and I sent it back. The replacement bag is splitting at the seam and I should send it back but haven't.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great for my yard
customer_reviews.text: I have two trees in my yard, and they shed the last of their leafs a few days ago. I received the leaf blower today and went right to work. It didn't take long to get the yard clear. Now what am I going I do with my rake?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice little sucker
customer_reviews.text: This has pretty good suction on high speed. Pulled up wet leaves as well. I am satisfied with it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dolt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just what i need, wish i would have gotten it earlier
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Blower/Vacuum unit works well but zipper on the vacuum bag is not adquate
customer_reviews.text: The unit works well, however, the vacuum bag's zipper is poor quality and broke in less that a year. The vacuum bag needs a heavy duty zipper to withstand this type of use.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S. Graham

customer_reviews.title: Great, affordable leaf vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: This leaf vacuum is perfect for me! Much easier than the alternative!
customer_reviews.author: Shyla Hohlier

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value!
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of power. Easy to assemble and convert from blowing to vacuuming. Great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Roger L. Sjoblom

customer_reviews.title: Can't rate at this time
customer_reviews.text: This item did not work and was returned 3 weeks ago. I would like to hear from someone regarding what we should do. This was a Christmas gift and he tried it for the first time a few weeks ago. Thank you for your help. Joann Taylor
customer_reviews.author: Joann Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great for a plug in
customer_reviews.text: I am saddened that i picked a plug in as opposed to a gas, but it works good!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Momi

customer_reviews.title: Great leaf vac!
customer_reviews.text: It has two speeds and the high speed suction does the job. It can even pull up wet leaves. Very impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Kelly Manning

customer_reviews.title: Worth 3x more
customer_reviews.text: Works amazing.. i have worked her hard as well!@ i would like to have a full metal blade but, no complaints so far..
customer_reviews.author: Race Car Builder, Lover, Driver..

customer_reviews.title: Really worthless vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a piece of junk. The vacuum has incredibly low suction and gets clogged almost immediately. I've tried to use it on leaves in my lawn three times now and every time the tube gets clogged so quickly I'd have an easier time picking up the leaves by hand.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Mitchell

product_meta.title: TACKLIFE Leaf Vacuum, 12 Amp 3-in-1 High Performance, Variable Speed Up to 240 MPH Blower GBV01A, Gray/Orange
feature_bullets: [High performance 540Cfm strong suction] - Tack life leaf blower vacuum own the powerful 12 amp motor, it generates 240 mph/ 540 CFM strong suction to remove debris and leaves. It empowers the cleaning work more efficiently. Lightweight and ergonomic design.

[3 in 1 multipurpose blower/VAC/Mulcher 3-in-1] - the blower/VAC offers a variety of functional, there is no need additional tools for complete your cleanup. 3-In-1 blower, vacuum and Mulcher, easy to handle dry leaves and debris.

11.9gal lightweight and durable bottom-zip bag] - the bag is designed to capture the crushed leaf Particles. The bottom zipper bag can more easily remove the debris from the inside of the bag. It doesn't need to be disassembled, which saves the operation time.

[2 variable speed switch, vacuum and blower facilitate conversion] - in a matter of seconds, The conversion between blower and vacuum can be performed, variable speed control gives better control of blower and vacuum modes. The blower vacuum is the ideal tool for cleaning blades and garden debris, use for clearing lanes, sidewalks, decks, garages and yards.
[WHAT YOU GET] – 1xTacklife GBV01A 12Amp Blower/Vac/Mulcher Blow Tube, 1x Vacuum Tube, 1x Detachable Shoulder Strap Bottom-zip Bag,1x User Manual, 1x Card 24 Months .

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars58 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
